attributes.title: Absolutely garbage

attributes.title: It was terrible
attributes.review: The app was terrible it didn’t let me do anything and why would I support a Cheeto. Let make it Trump 2020 💕🙈✨🧚‍♀️🌱💫 but on a grave. (Also sign the BLM petitions and the Yemen petitions)

attributes.title: ℯ𝓍𝓅𝒾𝓇ℯ𝒹 𝒸𝒽ℯℯ𝓉ℴ🤢
attributes.review: I wanted to see if the app was worth the hype, of-course it wasn’t. I now have the true honors to say that I was one of many, to delete this app. ☺️

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!!
attributes.review: Immediately tried to brainwash you, my son who was always a jolly boy, started throwing tantrums and crawling around the house on all fours after opening this app!!!
